location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 24 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus refers to the seizure by an Attoobee bugla [buggalow] from Bahrein [Bahrain] of a consignment of coffee from a boat belonging to Mocha. He reports that the Imam of Muscat [Said bin Sultan al-Said] had forced the bugla to restore the coffee to its rightful owners at Bombay.
